name: Operable Mechanism: Vertical Lifting Columns and Eliphas Beams

imgDesc.text: Sometimes, there will be a beam receptor mirror and an associated <color=#ffe14b>beam projector mirror</color> on a lifting column. When a beam shines on the receptor mirror, it will be emitted from the <color=#ffe14b>convex</color> projector mirror.

Sometimes, lifting columns will have spherical beam relays. When they receive a beam, they will transfer it to the associated beam generator, which will project a beam outward. Receiver nodes can control the direction of the beam generator.
